Name: Invite Friend
ActivityDes: You can share your invite code to Lv.≥20 commandants. If they use your code, you will have invited them successfully.

Name: Invite Code
ActivityDes: Welcome back to Gray Raven HQ. You can input the invite code of other commandants to receive corresponding rewards.

Name: Returning Player Experience Survey
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
Event Info:
The Command Central will conduct a returning player survey in order to improve its support for Commandants. Please tap the [Advance] button below and share your thoughts! Commandants who complete the survey are eligible for rewards.

Name: Return Support
ActivityDes: During the event, commandants in the "Return" state can complete the missions and get the rewards (the event ends when the Return state expires).

Name: Homeward Season
ActivityDes: Mission Info: Complete event missions to obtain [Tea Tins].

Name: Wintry Shackles
ActivityDes: Event Info: Play through the new event story [Wintry Shackles] and complete missions.

Name: Anchor Realm
ActivityDes:
Requirement: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. The brand-new limited-time challenge "Anchor Realm" has come with 4 challenge options.
2. Each challenge option has 1 to 5 difficulties. Clear the first difficulty to unlock the subsequent challenge option.
3. Beat challenges to get random chips and use them to improve the character's stats.
4. Complete event missions to get Nameplate and Coating reards.

Name: Corrupted Battlefront
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. The event consists of multiple chapters. Complete the main chapters to unlock the Hard mode.
2. Use the event exclusive characters to challenge and clear stages to gain rewards.
3. Clear specific stages to gain new event exclusive characters.
4. The first stage clearance will grant "Battle Notes" that can be spent in the Shop to get bonus rewards.
5. Clear stages to get "Mind Units" and use them to raise the character's Mind Level and unlock Mind Talents.
6. Complete Achievement Missions to get bonus rewards.

Name: Cooking Lulu
ActivityDes:
Requirement: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. Commandants will open a restaurant here with their Constructs. Experience a restaurant like no other. Come and create unforgettable memories with everyone!
2. Assign staff to the Prep Station to prepare Ingredients, to Cooking Station to cook them, and to the Service Area to sell the dishes for Lulu's Hearty Bowls. Use Master's Blessings to make the facilities work faster.
3. Spend Lulu's Hearty Bowls to hire more staff and upgrade the restaurant.
4. Complete the Daily Missions and Achievement Missions in Cooking Lulu to obtain Froggy's Fortunes that can be exchanged for Event Construct R&D Tickets, Trade Vouchers, and other items in the Event Shop.

Name: Joyous Wrappings
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.52.

Event Info:
1. This event is only accessible online with a team of 3 players.
2. Handmade Blessings - Moon-flavored Fillings will be available in the new season. Obtain Training Star rewards via daily missions and stages and use them to increase your Grade for this season.
3. The results of the new season will be cleared at the end of the event. Reach different Grades to obtain the corresponding rewards.
4. Hit the orbs required in each round to obtain round points. The more combos you get, the higher your points bonus will be! The player with the highest points will be the winner of the corresponding round!
5. Five new times were added to the event. Switch items in the room to your advantage!

Name: Overwinter
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40.

Ends on: 02/06/2022 5:00

Event Info:
1. You can obtain event tokens by clearing a stage.
2. Event tokens can be used to purchase items from the event shop.
3. Clearing a stage will earn you Challenge EXP. Your Authority Level will be increased when you earn a certain amount of Challenge EXP. Increased Authority Level will grant Battle bonuses including DMG increase.
(Note: Those bonuses can be applied to Overwinter stages only.)

Name: Sinister Craft
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. There are a total of 5 difficulty levels, all of which are highly challenging with [Lilith] being your formidable enemy.
2. All members will be reset upon death during the challenge, making the challenge easier to complete.
3. Each stage has its own 3-star clearance conditions. Collectibles will be rewarded once you have earned a total of 3 stars. The more stars you earn, the higher the quality of the collectibles will be.

Name: Deadlocked
ActivityDes:
[Requirements]: Commandant Lv. 52

 [Event Info]:
1. There are 3 divisions with each one having a different set of modes and rules.
2. In each division, you can select the characters you play as. Defeat all the opponents to be the winner.
3. Unlocking divisions will grant Super Cores. Equip them on the characters to grant them powerful Core Skills. Each core can be simultaneously equipped by multiple characters.
4. The first 2 divisions will grant Leap Blueprints and Residual Data Carriers for defeating each opponent for the first time. Rewards are only given out after defeating all opponents of a session.
5. Leap Blueprints can be used to enhance the effects of the Super Cores. And Residual Data Carriers can be used to upgrade team level, which will provide stat enhancement to all characters (including trial characters).

Name: Omniframe Target
ActivityDes:
New Omniframe:

※S-Rank Lightning Attacker [Alpha: Crimson Weave]
New Weapon:
※6★ [Nightblaze] (Daisho)

Info:
1. Character Research:
※[Alpha: Crimson Weave] will be available in the [Themed Research] Pool.
You have a 100% chance to get [Bianca: Stigmata] when they get an S-Rank character.
2. Weapon Research:
※[Nightblaze] will be available in the [Weapon Target] Research Pool
with the same rules and rates as other weapons.

Name: CUB Target
ActivityDes:
New CUB:

※S-Rank CUB [Motorbolt]
※Recommended Partner: [Alpha: Crimson Weave]

Info:
1. CUB Description:
(Active Skill) [Thunder Surge]: After pinging a total of 6 basic Signal Orbs, the CUB button will become available. After casting, Bolt will rush to the enemy and
bump the target, dealing <color=#0f70bc>90%</color> Physical DMG and leaving behind a Pulling Current that keeps pulling enemies within range and deals <color=#0f70bc>70%</color> Physical DMG 3 times.

(Active Skill) [Wheel Drift]: 
After pinging a total of 6 basic Signal Orbs, the CUB button will become available. After casting, Motorbolt will rush to the enemy and drift,
knocking away enemies within range and dealing <color=#0f70bc>400%</color> DMG.

(Special Passive) [Undying Flow]:
When Alpha: Crimson Weave casts <color=#0f70bc>Eternaflare</color> while she is equipped with Motorbolt, Base DMG increases by <color=#0f70bc>20%</color>. Casting <color=#0f70bc>Captive Shadow: Thunder Flare</color> will summon Motorbolt to assist with its Simple Active Skill. Cooldown: 8s.

2. CUB Research:
※[Motorbolt] will enter the [CUB Research] pool.
  You may select an S-Rank CUB as the target in CUB Research.
  During the event, if you select [Motorbolt] as the target, it will be guaranteed when you draw an S-Rank CUB.

ActivityDes: Info:\nDuring the event, [Snow Petals] can be obtained through "main interface - Snow Petals" Research for limited time.\nCommandants can spend [Snowy Blossoms] to perform Coating Research.

ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. Accumulate Intel Value by completing the Rate Missions of the Daily, the Weekly, and the current Intel Manual.
2. Raise the Rating Level by reaching the required Intel Value.
3. You will obtain the corresponding reward upon reaching the required Rating Level.
4. You can also purchase additional Intel to get better rewards.

ActivityDes: Requirements: Clear Normal Story 2-4 Mission

Name: Adaptation Fitting: Motorbolt
ActivityDes: Requirements: Commandant Lv.61

Name: Arcade Anima - Nanami
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40
Event Info:
1. Arcade Anima includes "Fragmented Memories" and "Heart-Lock Trial" modes, which contain character stories and character challenge stages respectively.
2. "Fragmented Memories" is unlocked by default. Commandants can obtain a special collectible after experiencing all stories.
3. "Heart-Lock Trial" stages can only be challenged after Commandants deploy the corresponding Constructs.
4. Commandants can complete the contract goals in the "Origins Contract" to obtain special bonuses in the "Heart-Lock Trial" mode.
5. Try to complete the 3-star stage goals in the "Heart-Lock Trial" as many as possible to obtain Construct-related special rewards including portraits, display poses, and stamps.

Name: The Night Train on New Year's Eve
ActivityTitle: The Night Train on New Year's Eve
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40


Event Info:
1. New Event Record Story: Spring Festival [The Night Train on New Year's Eve].
2. Permanent story. Stage progress will be retained.

Name: Cursed Waves
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.70

Info:
1. Cursed Waves: Crimson Tides is a permanently available game mode with the 4th ending/Insight system added to this update (Complete any ending to unlock). The 5th ending will be added in future updates.
2. In this game mode, you can get [Downfall Crystals] for leveling up in the [Curse Queller's Path] and gaining rewards. Reversing Tides is also added to this update for you to get the bonus Honorary Reward.

Name: Guild Expedition III
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Join the Command Bureau

Info:
1. Under the influence of the Sanctuary Guards and the Wheel of Fortune, the battle has more Ambushers.
2. New outposts that cannot be reconstructed are added to the battlefield. Beat them to shorten the Ambusher refresh interval in the same outpost queue.
3. In Lands of Resources, Ambushers closed to the base can be directly removed.
4. Take advantage of Lands of Resources and plan your route wisely are the key to beat the challenge!

Name: Arcade Anima - Watanabe
ActivityDes: Mission Info: Clear [Arcade Anima] during the event to obtain extra rewards.

Name: Arcade Anima - Alpha
ActivityDes: Mission Info: Clear [Arcade Anima] during the event to obtain extra rewards.

Name: Dark Winter Origin
ActivityDes: Mission Info: Complete event missions to obtain [Energy Cube].

Name: Cat Grab
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. Travel through time and gravity while grabbing resources in the space to earn Resource Points and purchase consumable add-ons and upgrade the UFO.
2. Complete Grab challenges to unlock more members.

Name: Candlelit Manifold
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40.
Stage open until: 2024/1/17, 06:59 (UTC)
Event shop open until: 2024/1/18, 01:59 (UTC)

Event Info:
1. You can obtain event tokens by clearing a stage. Some stages may drop random Memories.
2. Event tokens can be used to purchase items from the event shop.
3. Clearing a stage will earn you Challenge EXP. Your Authority Level will be increased when you earn a certain amount of Challenge EXP. Increased Authority Level will grant Battle bonuses including damage increase.
(Note: Those bonuses can be applied to Candlelit Manifold stages only.)

4. You can also purchase additional Intel to get better rewards.

Name: Guild Expedition III
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Joined a Command Bureau
Event Info:
1. Guild Expedition is available in the next update. Commandants should prepare in advance!
2. Join a Command Bureau and defeat the Final Boss to complete this event.
3. Ambushers appear more frequently in this event. Assign your team accordingly to manage them.
4. Prepare for a new type of Outpost. Watch your move in order not to be overwhelmed by Ambushers!

Name: Renaissance du Fantastique
ActivityDes: Event Info: Play through the new event story [Renaissance du Fantastique] and complete missions.

Name: Blazing Trails
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. Control Trailblazer to complete challenges in Blazing Trails.
2. There are 2 modes: [Trailblazer's Past] and [Glorious Challenge].
3. In [Trailblazer's Past], learn about Trailblazer's story and unlock different modifications for Trailblazer.
4. Defeat 3 powerful Bosses in [Glorious Challenge]. You can mix and match modules to complete the challenges!

Name: Palette Clash
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. Engage in the clash between Constellia's three Schools of Mechanical Art. Discover the hidden truth with Dulcinea's help.
2. This game mode takes place over a series of rounds. Level up all three Schools to Level 6 to achieve victory!
3. Your opponents (the three Masters from the three Schools) will level up randomly during the rounds. You lose the game when all three Masters reach Level 6!
4. Interact with Vera, Lee, Ayla, and Karenina during the game to discover clues to unravel this mystery.
5. Clear the stage to gain Stamps and Collectibles as rewards.
6. Will Surrealist Mechanical Fauvism, Fantastical Mechanical Impressionism, or Multidimensional Mechanical Cubism triumph in Consterllia? It's up to you to decide!

Name: Babel Tower: Sidereal Impression
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.60

Event Info:
1. Babel Tower is a set of high-difficulty stages.
2. Each stage has its own affixes, which will change the way the stage works.
3. You can select different strategic targets each stage. They will increase the difficulty of combat.
4. You can select affixes for stages. The affixes can aid you in combat.
5. The characters you used to complete the stages will be locked and become unavailable in other stages.
6. You will earn collectible rewards for joining Babel Tower. Your final strategic level will earn you different resource rewards and improve the collectible's quality.

Name: Memory Rescue
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. Challenge stages in Memory Rescue - Canvas Chronicle comes with special mechanics. The 3 Chapters will become available over time, and the difficulty will increase as the Chapters progress.
2. Challenge stages will become available as their Chapter unlocks. Gain 1st Clear Reward upon clearing the stages for the first time.
3. There are Chapter Targets for each Chapter. Completing each Target will grant you the corresponding rewards.

Name: Sequence Pact
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.90

Mode Info:
1. A new permanent game mode, "Sequence Pact", is now available with 6 Challenge Sequences. The Sequences are not sequential. You are free to challenge them in any order.
2. Each Sequence contains 3 consecutive stages. Clear all of them to complete the Sequence.
3. You can dispatch characters to guard a cleared Sequence. Only members who have awakened their Infinitas Ranks can guard.
4. Each Sequence corresponds to the Hypertuned Memory with the same designation. Once guarded, the Sequence grants a bonus to the corresponding Memory: all members gain a 1% Extra DMG Bonus in all battles for each Hypertuned Memory in the Grid with the same designation.
5. It is recommended that you prioritize challenging and guarding Sequences with more Hypertuned Memories.

Name: Kaleidoscopic Dream
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40.
Stage open until: 2024/2/22, 06:59 (UTC)
Event shop open until: 2024/2/23, 01:59 (UTC)

Event Info:
1. You can obtain event tokens by clearing a stage. Some stages may drop random Memories.
2. Event tokens can be used to purchase items from the event shop.
3. Clearing a stage will earn you Challenge EXP. Your Authority Level will be increased when you earn a certain amount of Challenge EXP. Increased Authority Level will grant Battle bonuses including DMG increase.
(Note: Those bonuses can be applied to Kaleidoscopic Dream stages only.)

Name: CUB Target
ActivityDes:
New CUB:
※S-Rank CUB [Rainbow]
※Recommended Partner: [Ayla: Kaleido]

Info:
1. CUB Description:
[Refraction Siphon] (Active Skill): After pinging a total of 6 basic Signal Orbs, 
the CUB button will become available. 
After casting, Rainbow will swim to the target, 
pull enemies within range, and deal <color=#0f70bc>100%</color> DMG. 
Then, Rainbow will unleash a dazzling energy explosion, 
dealing <color=#0f70bc>200%</color> DMG to enemies within range.

[Ripple Dash] (Active Skill): After pinging a total of 6 basic Signal Orbs, 
the CUB button will become available. After casting, 
Rainbow will swiftly swim forward and deal <color=#0f70bc>65%</color> DMG 
to the enemies ahead 3 times. 
Then, Rainbow will immediately return and 
deal <color=#0f70bc>90%</color> DMG 
to the enemies on the path 3 times.

[Inner Storm] (Special Passive):
When Ayla: Kaleido casts <color=#0f70bc>Pure Color: Theme Emphasis</color> 
or <color=#0f70bc>Color Mix: Clash of Concepts</color> with Rainbow equipped,
Base DMG will increase by <color=#0f70bc>6%</color>, and Rainbow will pull 
nearby enemies and deal <color=#0f70bc>20%</color> Ice DMG 3 times. 
Casting <color=#0f70bc>Vibrant Brushstroke</color> will increase her Base DMG by <color=#0f70bc>6%</color> 
and summon Rainbow to assist with its basic Active Skill. 
Cooldown: 2s.

2. CUB Research:
※[Rainbow] will enter the [CUB Research] pool.
  You may select an S-Rank CUB as the target in CUB Research.
  During the event, if you select [Rainbow] as the target, 
it will be guaranteed when you draw an S-Rank CUB.

Name: Futurismo
ActivityDes: Mission Info: Complete event missions to obtain [Origami Windmills].

Name: Spiral of Chronos
ActivityDes: Event Info: Play through the new event story [Spiral of Chronos] and complete missions.

Name: Simulacrum Submersion
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.52

[Event Info]:
1. Simulacrum Submersion is divided into 6 levels. Each level includes multiple combat zones, which will be unlocked over time and along with the status of the prerequisite levels.
2. Clear the combat zones and complete event missions to get event tokens that can be exchanged for rewards.
3. Each battle will grant add-ons. Equip the character with add-ons to greatly boost their combat capabilities.
4. Clear designated zones to unlock more new features that will enhance your team's combat capabilities.
5. Quickly obtain add-ons from the completed zones via Dispatch.

Name: Arcade Anima
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Mode Info:
1. Arcade Anima includes "Fragmented Memories" and "Heart-Lock Trial" modes, which contain character stories and character challenge stages respectively.
2. "Fragmented Memories" is unlocked by default. You can obtain a special collectible after experiencing all stories.
3. "Heart-Lock Trial" can only be unlocked after you obtain the corresponding Constructs.
4. You can complete the contract goals in the "Origins Contract" to obtain special bonuses in the "Heart-Lock Trial" mode.
5. Try to complete the 3-star stage goals in the "Heart-Lock Trial" as many as possible to obtain Construct-related special rewards including portraits, display poses, and stamps.

Name: Spectroscopic Binary Star
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.52

 [Event Info]:
1. This is a single-player mode that allows you to deploy two characters to the battlefield to fight the enemy.
2. Use Reinforcement Skills in battle to let the other character trigger Matrix and attack the enemy.
3. Each stage has its unique mechanic. Select team members wisely based on the mechanic.
4. The event consists of 3 chapters. The first 2 chapters are of normal difficulty. Clear them and you will win most of the rewards. The 3rd chapter, however, grants a tougher challenge.

Name: Hyperspace Collapse
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. There are a total of 5 difficulty levels, all of which are highly challenging with [The Merciful One] being your formidable enemy.
2. All members will be reset if knocked out during the challenge, making the challenge easier to complete.
3. Each stage has its own 3-star clearance conditions. Collectibles will be rewarded once you have earned a total of 3 stars. The more stars you earn, the higher the quality of the collectibles will be.

Name: Magic Square Trial
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.52

 [Event Info]:
1. Form a team of three to participate in the event. Take advantage of the bombs' explosion patterns and adjust where the team members stand accordingly to attack the boss and earn points.
2. The mode consists of two difficulty modes. The hard mode will be available as scheduled.
3. Each stage contains multiple rounds. Each round is made up of Operation Phases and judgement phases. You can move freely in operation phases and carry any bombs. In judgement phases, your movement will be restricted, different bombs will explode in different areas, and the result of the current round will be settled.
4. Use the bombs to hit the boss and earn points. When your team hit the boss with bombs of the same color, you will obtain a critical bonus. However, hitting by the boss's bombs will reduce your personal points for the corresponding round.
5. In the hard mode, you can take damage from the bombs from your teammates. Hitting teammates or being hit by teammates will reduce points.

Name: CUB Target
ActivityDes:
New CUB:
※S-Rank CUB [Punchy]
※Recommended partner: [Lee: Hyperreal]

Info:
1. CUB Description:
(Active Skill) [Downward Punch: Fire]: After pinging a total of 6 basic Signal Orbs, the CUB button will become available. After casting, Punchy will open a portal and then quickly throw an Ultralimit Punch downward, dealing Fire DMG to all enemies across the screen.

(Active Skill) [Upward Punch: Fire]: After pinging a total of 6 basic Signal Orbs, the CUB button will become available. After casting, Punchy will open a portal and then quickly throw an Ultralimit Punch upward, dealing Fire DMG 5 times to enemies in a small area.

(Special Passive) [Potential Resonance]: Each time Punchy casts an Active Skill, the carrier's ATK increases for 8s.

(Special Passive) [Mark of Overlapping Void Matrix]: When Lee: Hyperreal is equipped with Punchy, the Base DMG of <color=#ff5656>Hypermatrix Strike</color> and <color=#ff5656>Collapsing Realm</color> increases. Casting <color=#ff5656>Realm Travel</color> or <color=#ff5656>Retribution</color> will summon Punchy to throw a <color=#ff5656>Downward Punch</color> to assist Lee, dealing damage based on the Skill Level of Punchy's Active Skill <color=#ff5656>Downward Punch</color>.
2. CUB Research:
※[Punchy] will enter the [CUB Research] pool.
You may select an S-Rank CUB as the target in CUB Research.
During the event, if you select [Punchy] as the target, it will be guaranteed when you draw an S-Rank CUB.

Name: Egg Hawker
ActivityDes:
A mysterious hawker is selling Easter eggs. 
What? Commandant can get R&D Tickets from the eggs?!
 But how many tickets will you get? Let's find out!

1. During the event, complete event mission [Easter Egg Hunter] to get event coins.
2. Exchange [Egg Coins] for various Easter eggs. 
Use Easter eggs to get random rewards.
3. Exchange [Bunny Coins] for Bunny Pots. Use Bunny Pots to get Decors.
4. All event-related items will be recycled once expired, please use them in time. Coins will expire at UTC 06:59, 4/15 ;
 3 types of Easter Eggs and Bunny Clay Pot will expire at UTC 06:59, 4/22

(Tap Go to get to Exchange Shop)

ActivityDes: Event Info: Complete following missions to collect [Egg Coin] and [Bunny Coin], then exchange items in [Easter Hawker] Shop.

Name: Norman Revival Plan
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.60.

Event Info:
1. Each phase lasts 14 days, and you will enter the Battle phase when any stage is cleared in the first 4 days (or automatically enter the Battle phase after the first 4 days). The Battle phase lasts 10 days.
2. During the preparation phase, Lv.60-84 players will automatically enter the "qualifying battle", while players of Lv.85 and above can choose between "ordinary battle" and "pioneer battle".
3. "Ordinary battle" and "pioneer battle" are of the same difficulty. Ordinary battle gives more electricity but fewer rewards, while pioneer battle gives less electricity but more rewards.
4. The Cover Tactic will be unlocked on the third day of the Battle phase. Clear the stage to obtain Electricity and item rewards.
5. A battle will be conducted in form of multiple teams playing at the same time, and the characters involved shall be selected in accordance with the battle environment.
6. Electricity is supplied by the Power Station. You may consume electricity on the Team page to increase your team's Battle Power.
7. After clearing a stage, you can obtain Autonomous Miners and Tantalum Ore. At the end of each day, the miners will also produce Tantalum Ore and grow by 50% of the current number of miners.
8. Tantalum Ore can be exchanged for rewards in the shop.

Name: New Year Lottery
ActivityDes: Instructions: Complete event missions to obtain [New Year Token].

Name: Starry Conversations
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. Gain Astro-Mystery Boxes by playing poker guessing in Starry Conversations and completing missions.
2. On the Character Story screen in Starry Conversations, you can gift different characters Astro-Mystery Boxes to unlock and view their Valentine's Day story.
3. The hint function has been added to poker guessing. Now you can use it to find out whether the next card is higher or lower.

Name: Fortune of Spring
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40.

Event Info:
1. During the event, the event mission [Fortune of Spring] will be available for a limited time.
2. The first clear of each stage will grant a 1st Clear Reward!
3. Let's have fun together, Commandants!

Name: White Wishes
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant lv.40

[Event Info]:
1. During the event, the [White Wishes] event mission will be available for a limited time.
2. Participate in the story with other Gray Ravens for an unexpected journey!

Name: Love Letters
ActivityDes:
※Exchange gifts to express your true feelings and create beautiful memories on this special day.

Event Info:
1. During the event, you can get a special gift item [Radiant Comradery] from event mails or by buying the Purchase Supply Pack.
2. On the [Members - Communication] interface, send special gifts to members to trigger 520 Comms and receive gift mails from the corresponding members.
3. Each character's 520 Comm can only be triggered once.
—For example, sending a special gift to [Liv: Lux] after sending one to [Liv: Eclipse] will not trigger a Comm again.
4. Gift mails from the characters contain a special item [Voice of Thoughts]. Collect it to unlock and upgrade the corresponding collectibles.
